page.title: 07Bryn Adda Farm
page.content: Bryn Adda used to be a farm but they have changed some of the building to form a bigger house. Mr.R.Beaverstock owns the house at present.It has a stone with the date 1728 on it built in the outer wall. The original body blueslate(on what used to be the buildings have red tiles. Bryn Adda Bryn Adda is probably the oldest dwelling in the area. The Monks from Valle Crucis Abbey,used to use it as a stopping place. On their way across the mountain to Ruabon church,which was then an Abbey type church.
